abstract: After ending its deal with Allied, Transatlantic will continue to consider other takeover offers, including bids by Validus and a unit of Berkshire Hathaway.
snippet: After ending its deal with Allied, Transatlantic will continue to consider other takeover offers, including bids by Validus and a unit of Berkshire Hathaway.
lead_paragraph: Transatlantic Holdings and Allied World Assurance called off their proposed $2.94 billion merger on Friday, after the two insurers faced stiff shareholder opposition and two rival bids for Transatlantic.

headline.main: Transatlantic Ends Deal With Allied World

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
